name: ChatGPT
description:
ChatGPT is an extremely powerful chatbot. It can answer a wide variety of questions in both English and Vietnamese. It can support programming from Front-end to Back-end. Additionally, the ChatGPT account can answer many different types of questions, including those related to knowledge, culture, society, and other fields.

I. ChatGPT Plus Account Pricing - OpenAI

- GPT-4o technology, preparing to update to the latest GPT-5.
- Official account with full Plus features
- Warranty for the entire usage period

1) Shared package:

- Shared access account
- Login on 1-2 fixed devices.
- No password changes allowed

2) Personal use/upgrade package:

- Receive a pre-created account or upgrade your own account, 100% private use.
- Use on multiple devices.
- Password changes allowed.
shortDescription: ChatGPT is a powerful AI chatbot that can answer a wide range of questions in both English and Vietnamese, supporting programming from Front-end to Back-end.

name: Grok
description:
Super Grok 3 Account - Powerful AI tool to optimize work and creativity

If you're looking for a smart, powerful AI tool to support your work, learning, or content creation, Super Grok 3 is the ideal choice.
shortDescription: Grok AI helps automatically analyze and process large data quickly, supporting accurate decision-making and saving time. Widely applied in many fields such as market analysis, automated customer service, fraud detection, and business process optimization.
